text: Youri Marion A. Tielemans (born 7 May 1997) is a Belgian football player. He plays as a midfielder for Aston Villa and the Belgium national team. == References == Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Aston Villa F.C. players Category:Premier League players Category:2018 FIFA World Cup players Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players Category:People from Flemish Brabant Category:UEFA Euro 2024 players
title: Youri Tielemans
